tweet: By 2025, delivery vans in dense cities like 🇺🇸New York and 🇬🇧London are projected to account for 30% of urban vehicle miles traveled, driving a 45% rise in traffic congestion from 2022 levels.
category: urban traffic growth caused by delivery vans in dense cities

tweet:
FedEx $FDX logistics infrastructure: 370 aircraft fleet delivers 15 million packages daily across 220 countries.

🇺🇸 Memphis hub processes 2.5 million packages per day at 99.9% efficiency.

In 2025, Singapore tops cities for weekly online grocery and food delivery usage, with 65% penetration.

2. 🇺🇸 New York: 58%
